athletecruit.title: AI College Recruiting Advisor
objectives: Check it out here: www.athletecruit.com
An AI college recruiting advisor which helps families maximize the recruiting options of high school athletes
The advisor determines which school types the student has a good chance of being recruited to, and then scans live roster performance data to find gaps that the student can fill

infield.title: Fitness Expertise Marketplace
objectives: Check it out here: www.infieldconnect.co
Platform that provides access to affordable personalized fitness expertise to anyone.
Athletes get paid to share their expertise, and fans get unprecidented access to world-class insights.

celoxis.title: Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) Program
objectives: Transfer client project data between databases
Automatically re-format and transform data to ensure compatability

labjack.title: Low-code Data Acquisition Solution
objectives: Minimize startup expenses by developing the site without 3rd-party services
Ensure that users can easily and securely join and donate to organization
Display recent content from the organization's social media account

bbag.title: Reactive Website for a Non-Profit DEI Organization
objectives: Minimize startup expenses by developing the site without 3rd-party services
Ensure that users can easily and securely join and donate to organization
Display recent content from the organization's social media account

arm.title: Fully Anthropromorphic Robotic Hand
objectives: Design a hand that replicates the ranges of motion of a real hand using ten motors
Map the natural DOF of the human hand to determine which DOFs are interdependent
Construct the hand and perform strength, speed, and reliability testing

pump.title: Cyclical Aspiration Pump and Regulator
objectives: Develop a vacuum regulator that is compatible with any commercially sold vacuum pump and can achieve a cycle frequency of at least 5 Hz
Develop a cyclical vacuum pump system with a vacuum pressure of at least 29 inHg

sarr.title: Semi-Autonomous Search and Rescue Robot
objectives: [Team] Build a robot that can complete all tasks in the final demonstration
[Team] Meet all intermediary deadlines and milestones
[Individual] Design the arm mechanism and collaboratively write the autonomous controls

tissue.title: Automatic Tissue Measurement Device
objectives: Design a novel device that measures organ tissue thickness inside the patient
The device must be operable using one hand
The device must record a thickness measurement once while maintaining 8 g/mm2 of pressure on the tissue, and only compress the tissue in increments of <0.01 mm

bluetooth.title: Bluetooth-Enabled Door Opening Device & App
objectives: Create a device that opens a door when prompted by a Bluetooth-enabled app
The application must pair and communicate with the device via Bluetooth
The device must be light and compact enough to attach to a dormitory door

shutter.title: Python-Operated Laser Optics Shutter
objectives: Develop a mechanical shutter to pulse laser light at Erbium atoms
Shutter system must cost <$50 while matching the performance of +$300 shutters
Design a mechanical shutter (SolidWorks) and an accompanying PCB (EAGLE)
Write a script to operate the shutter (Python and script to analyze data (MATLAB)

bike.title: Converting a Single-Speed Bike into an E-Bike
objectives: Earn machine shop certification before the end of my first semester at Princeton
Calculate optimal gear ratio for Princeton's worst hill incline
Design and fabricate apparatus to affix motor, batteries, and other components
E-bike must be water, snow, and shock proof to last four years
